snippet.title: Recruits - Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Recruits - http://recruitsgame.com
QUByte Interactive
Commotion Games Pty Ltd

To get ready for our Steam Early Access release, we have created an updated teaser trailer with our all new effects, levels and assets.

About Recruits:
Recruits is a squad based top down shooter. Inspired by games like Cannon Fodder, Alien Swarm and Jagged Alliance Recruits puts players on the front lines of the battlefield to accomplish your missions through any means necessary. Fast paced and packed with explosions, Recruits offers a wide variety of features that allow you, and your friends to take command of the action and lead your men to victory.

Check out:
http://recruitsgame.com/

Follow and Like us!
http://facebook.com/qubyteinteractive
https://twitter.com/qubytegames

http://facebook.com/commotiongames
https://twitter.com/commotiongame
